text: (To Herself) Today is the day, Testing day. She dresses in a simple grey robe, and exits the room. INT. CANTEEN вЂ” NOON TRIS sits around a table with her brother CALEB, and neighbour SUSAN. In the b.g. people gather in groups arou the canteen. One group plays cards, laughing, and shoutin One group chats over books. One group of all girls play h slapping games. One group debates.  The people at TRISвЂ™ table sit quietly. A lady dressed identically to TRIS steps into the room.
(Shouting) From Abnegation: Caleb Prior CALEB stands up, and walks to the lady, but hesitates, an turns around to face TRIS.
Good Luck, Tris. YouвЂ™1l be fine. And Susan as well. SUSAN nods her head in acknowledgement.
Thank-you Caleb, IвЂ™m sure youвЂ™ll be fine as well. TRIS opens and closes her mouth several times, wanting to speak.
Thanks, brother. CALEB walks away, and TRIS looks like she wants to say mo to CALEB.
INT. CANTEEN вЂ” NOON

From Abnegation: Susan Black and Beatrice Prior. SUSAN and TRIS walk to the exit, and outside the cafeteri and a row of ten rooms. The rooms are separated by mirror SUSAN walks to room 5, and TRIS walks to room 6, SUSAN gr at TRIS. TRIS walks into room 6, and a dauntless woman wi small, dark, eyes, wearing a black blazer, TORI, waits inside. TORI has a tattoo on her neck.
DonвЂ™t worry, dear. It doesnвЂ™t hurt. My nameвЂ™s Tori, now have a seat and get comfortable.  3. TRIS sits in the chair gracelessly, and TORI attaches wir to TRISвЂ™ head.
Why the hawk? TRIS looks ashamed the moment she finishes asking. TORI laughs softly, and looks amused.

IвЂ™ve never met a curious Abnegation before, most certainly strange for your faction. I thought questioning was considered vain, and unnecessary. Tris opens her mouth, and closes it again, like a fish. T looks at TRIS and just laughs, gently, not scornfully, bu amused.
IвЂ™m just, just taken back by the tattoo. WeвЂ™ve never been allowed them, or anything else besides the basics.

ThatвЂ™s quite all right. The hawk on my tattoo in some parts of the ancient world, symbolized the sun. Back when I got this, I figured if I always had the sun on me, I wouldn't be afraid not even in the darkest of times. TORI passes TRIS a clear vial of liquid.
Now Drink.
WhatвЂ™s this?

CanвЂ™t tell you, just trust me. TRIS tilts her head back, and drinks. EXTREME CLOSE UP - TRISвЂ™ EYES TRISвЂ™ eyes snap close.  INT. CANTEEN вЂ” NOON TRIS stands in the empty canteen, it is now snowing outsi There are two tables in front of her, one holds a hunk of cheese. The other a knife over one feet long. WOMANвЂ™S VOICE (0.S.) Choose. TRIS tenses up.

Why? Why should I choose? WOMANвЂ™S VOICE (0.S.) Choose. TRIS looks around her, no one is there. TRIS relaxes a little, and scowls. WOMAN'S VOICE (CONTвЂ™D) Fine, Have it your way. The canteen disappears.

A dog with a pointed nose stands yards from her. It crouc growls, and snarls. TRIS stays absolutely still, and proc to bow. The dog accepts the gesture, and TRIS proceeds to stroke the dog. A girl appears dressed in white.
Puppy! The dog growls, snaps, and pounces towards the girl. TRIS hurls her body, and pins the dog. The scene dissolves.

TRIS stands on a bus, and looks around. All the seats are taken but one in the back. TRIS moves towards the seat, a is stopped by a man reading a newspaper as he grabs TRISв arm, and clenches the paper.

Do you know this guy? The Man taps the front page of the newspaper. The headlin reads вЂњBrutal Murderer Finally Apprehended!вЂќ TRIS sta the paper blankly, and shows signs of recognition.  MAN WITH NEWSPAPER (CONTвЂ™D) (Angrily) Well? Do you? TRIS looks thoughtful for a moment, and seems scared. TRI expression changes to a blank one, as she makes her decis
Nope. No idea who he is. The man snarls, and leans close to TRISвЂ™ face.
(Escalating) YouвЂ™re Lying. You're Lying. YOU
TRIS is visibly shaken
(Shaking) I am not.

head_text.subj: I CAN SEE IT IN YOUR EYES

text: Nope.
(Whispering) If you know him, you could save me. You could save ME!
(Hesitantly) Well... I Do Not Know Him.
EXTREME CLOSE UP - TRISвЂ™ EYES TRISвЂ™ eyes snap open. TORI is standing beside her, with strange look.
(slowly) That... was well... perplexing. TORI stand slowly and leaves the room. TRIS ponders at TO mysterious words. The minutes drag on, and TRIS becomes worried. TORI comes back in.
Sorry to worry you. TORIвЂ™s expression changes, and her posture tenses up.
(Cautiously) Beatrice, your results were inconclusive. Typically, the factions would be eliminated stage by stage. You only eliminated 2 out of 5.
(Surprised) Two?

Choosing the cheese would've confirmed your aptitude for peace, and therefore Amity. Choosing the knife would've confirmed otherwise. You lied to the man on the bus, and your dishonestly ruled out Candor, only they tell the truth on that one. But that leaves us a problem, people who tell truth, are Candor, and Abnegation. TRIS looks confused.

But, you threw yourself at the dog in selflessness for the girl. That confirms Abnegation, but on the bus when the man said that you could save him you didnвЂ™t tell the truth. Which rules out Abnegation.
(Interrupting) Wait, what does this mean for my aptitude.
Yes, and No. My conclusion is that you display aptitude for Abnegation, Dauntless, and Erudite. They are called.... TORI tenses up, and leans very closely to TRIS
(Very Very Softly) Divergent. TORI rights herself back up.
Under no circumstance are you to share that information with anyone. Absolutely no one, never in your life, forever. You understand? TRIS looks confused for a moment, but nods.
I suggest you go home, and do some thinking. TORI tenses up, and grabs TRISвЂ™ wrists as TRIS turns to leave.

(Desperately) Choose wisely, Tris. Wisely. Choose where you think you belong, sometimes YOU have to come FIRST, no one else, YOU. Choose for YOURSELF, and above all, DONвЂ™T TELL ANYONE. TORI lets go slowly, as TRISвЂ™ hesitantly turns, and lea INT. THE HUBвЂ™S LOBBY - DAY TRIS, CALEB, and SUSAN stand together in a group of Abnegation members. They dress identically in gray shirts and gray slacks. The group enters the elevator taking up of the space. The Amity dressed in bright colours, attemp enter the crowded elevator, and the Abnegation led by a M who looks like TRIS and CALEB, their father offers Amity elevator. The Abnegation walking in uniform follows TRISв FATHER up the stairs.

The room is arranged in concentric circles with a podium 5 bowls in the middle, and the 16 year olds stand on the edges in alphabetical order. The factions sit together in groups (Amity/Peace, Candor/Truth, Erudite/Knowledge, Abnegation/Selflessness, Dauntless/Bravery). TRISвЂ™ FATH MOTHER come up to her and CALEB.  TRISвЂ™ FATHER (confidently) Good Luck. See you soon.

Thank-you father. TRISвЂ™ PARENTS turn to CALEB, but then TRISвЂ™ MOTHER tu back, and clutchвЂ™s TRIS. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER (Whispered) I love you, Beatrice, No matter what. Remember, I love you. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER forlornly turns away. In the b.g. TRISвЂ™ do the same to CALEB. Then an Abnegation member stands up the podium and clears his throat.

Welcome to the Choosing Ceremony. Today we honour the philosophy of our ancestors, which dictates we each have our right to choose his own way. It was centuries ago that our ancestors realized that war was not born of ideology, or beliefs, but the facets of mankindвЂ™s personality, of mankindвЂ™s nature. Factions were born of the belief, separated by the qualities they believed responsible for the worldвЂ™s disarray. MARCUS waves to the bowl of earth.

Those who blamed aggression formed Amity. The brightly clothes group smiles as MARCUS waves to the of water. MARCUS (CONTвЂ™D) Those who blamed ignorance became Erudite. The group shifts as MARCUS waves to the bowl of glass.
Those who blamed duplicity created Candor. The black and white dressed group looks to one another a MARCUS waves to the bowl of grey stones.

Those who blamed selfishness made Abnegation. TRIS moves and shifts in nervousness as her faction is mentioned. CALEB grabs her arms to steady TRIS, and reass her. MARCUS waves to the bowl of lit coals.

Those who blamed cowardice were the Dauntless. A group of tattooed and pierced people smiles. MARCUS (CONTвЂ™D) These five factions have lived in peace for many years coexisted in harmony. Abnegation provided the selfless leaders in government. Candor provided the trustworthy leaders in law. Erudite provided teachers, and researchers. Amity has given us counselors and caretakers, and Dauntless supplies us with protection from the outside... MARCUS deliberately speaks the next words with emphasis.

And from the Enemy Within. But the factions provided us also with family, purpose, meaning, and life. Apart from them, we would not survive, for Faction before Blood. Therefore may this day bring new initiates, for a happier, brighter, better future. The room erupts into applause. MARCUS proceeds to read na as the initiates proceed one by one to the bowls choosing their faction.
Caleb Prior. CALEB squeezes TRISвЂ™ hand, and hugs her one last time. brings his mouth very close to TRISвЂ™ ear.  10.

(Very softly) Beatrice, we should think of family. But... But.. Sometimes we must also think of ourselves. CALEB walks to the bowls, and TRIS stands confused. CALEB takes the knife from MARCUS, and presses it into his hand drawing blood. He stands over the bowls, and very slowly, hesitantly moves his hand to the bowl of water. His blood drops slowly into the bowl turning the water even redder. room erupts into mutters led by the Abnegation, CALEB is first Abnegation to transfer. The Erudite looks smug, and Abnegation tense.

(Shouting) Quiet! Quiet Please!. MARCUS looks down to the list. MARCUS (CONTвЂ™D) Beatrice Prior. TRIS walks very slowly, and hesitantly over to the bowls. room dead silent, with indecision showing in TRISвЂ™ eyes Abnegation tense up even more. TRIS takes the knife, and draws blood from her hand, shivering a little at the pain EXTREME CLOSE UP - TRISвЂ™ HAND The blood wells up on TrisвЂ™ hand, as her hand hesitates between two bowls. The blood drips onto the floor. TRISвЂ moves jerkily to one bowl, and one drop of blood drips.
(Desperately, echoing) Sometimes YOU have to come FIRST.... CHOOSE for YOURSELF. Choose wisely.

The drop of blood falls, and falls, and hits burning coal The fire envelopes the drop of blood, and burns stronger. TRIS turns to leave the podium, and spots TRISвЂ™ FATHERв EYESвЂ™ burning, looking accusingly. TRISвЂ™ tenses up. T MOTHER smiles, with tears in her eyes.  11.

A train suspended on tracks 7 stories up roars by, and a stream of DAUNTLESS INITIATES jump out. TRIS jumps out la The Group walks to the opposite side of the roof where a wrinkled, dark-skinned, gray haired Dauntless Leader, MAX waits for them.
Several stories below, is the memberвЂ™s entrance. If you canвЂ™t jump, you donвЂ™t belong here. Initiates first. An ERUDITE GIRL gapes.
(Incredulously) You want us to jump of a LEDGE?? MAX curls his lips, and looks amused.
Yes.
Is there something down there to catch us? Water? Mats?

(Offhandedly) Maybe. Who Knows? Volunteers? MAX steps aside, and no one moves. TRIS slowly, and hesitantly moves to the edge, and looks down. ItвЂ™s 7 st high, and at the bottom is a huge hole, encircled by buildings on all sides. She looks up, and at the hole aga and slowly bends her knees and jump. ItвЂ™s pitch black a falls. TRIS hits a net after a few seconds. TRIS looks relieved, and shakily climbs off. A Dauntless member, wit deep-set dark blue eyes, FOUR, grabs TRISвЂ™ hand, and pu her up. TRIS stands on a platform in an open cavern.
Can't believe it, A stiff, first? Miraculous. Probably why you left in the first place. WhatвЂ™s your name? TRIS hesitates, and FOUR faintly smiles.
Choose carefully, you'll only pick once.  12. TRIS considers for a moment.
(with certainty) Tris, my name is Tris. FOUR holds up TRISвЂ™s hand.
(Shouting) First Jumper - TRIS! The crowd of Dauntless appear out of the darkness, and ch FOUR pulls TRIS away as the next Jumper is heard.
Welcome to Dauntless.

The initiates stand at the bottom of a huge underground p rising several stories high. Caves are carved into the wa for food, clothing, etc. Narrow paths connect them with n barriers. The non-Dauntless initiates stand awed.

This is where we divide. Dauntless- born initiates, Lauren, is waiting for you at the top of the Pit. I trust you do not need a tour of this place. The Dauntless-born all hurry away, and climb the pit with deft skill. TRIS looks around, counting the initiates lef there are 9. TRISвЂ™ abnegation uniform stands out from t rest are Erudite, and candor.
I normally work in Control, but I will be your instructor for the next few weeks. My name is FOUR. ThereвЂ™s a general murmur in the crowd at the name.
Is there a problem? The crowd silences immediately.

Now, this is the Pit, you will learn to enjoy it.  13. TRIS looks around, there are no elderly Dauntless. FOUR m into the light, and his back is covered in a tattoo peaki out from the collar of his shirt. FOUR waves to the pitch black right side of the Pit.

That, will be the chasm. Follow me, I will show you. The sound of fast moving water breaks the sound of footfa The initiates arrive at the edge, and the floor drops off nearly vertically several stories. ThereвЂ™s a river at t bottom .

(Shouting) Let this be the reminder that the line between bravery, and idiocy is very fine. One jump will end it all. ItвЂ™s happened before, and it will happen again. The initiates murmur, as they are led to the dining call across the Pit. The dining hall is full of people, and clattering silverware. The Dauntless notice the initiates and make noise, applause, stomps, and shouts, welcoming t initiates.
The initiates sit around a side table, FOUR sits with the The tables are laden with hamburgers. TRIS looks at the f confused.
ItвЂ™s beef, put this on it. FOUR passes tris a small container of red sauce, ketchup. Candor girl beside TRIS tall, dark brown skinned, with sh hair, CHRISTINA, looks surprised.
You've never had hamburgers?
(Slightly Amused and Curious) No. .... (beat) So, thatвЂ™s what itвЂ™s called. CHRISTINA eyes widen ever furthur, and looks shocked.  14.

(simply) Stiffs eat plain food, extravagance is apparently considered self- indulgent, and unnecessary, food, clothing, adornments, everything. CHRISTINAвЂ™s expression changes from shocked to smirky.
No wonder you left. TRIS rolls her eyes, and giggles, the sound still a bit foreign.
Yup, because of the food. CHRISTINA smiles, and giggles, and extends her hand.
Christina, from Erudite. TRIS accepts the hand, and shakes it.
Tris, from Abnegation.
I can tell.
FOUR arrives leading the initiates. He stops abruptly, an turns to face them.

We take initiation very seriously, so training is everything. Some rules: you have to be in the training room by 8 oвЂ™clock every day. Training is from 8 to 6 each day with a break for lunch. After that, itвЂ™s free to do whatever that you transfers do. ThereвЂ™s break time between each stage. TRIS seems shocked by the concept of time off, and free t whatever you want.
This will happen, each and every day! Understood!!  15. The initiates all nod.
You can only leave the compound with a Dauntless, and beyond those doors FOUR gestures to the sturdy wooden door behind him.
Is where you will be sleeping for the initiation. There are 10 beds, and only 9 of you. Evidently we were expecting more to make it. looks confused.
But we started with 12...

(casually) There are always at least one transfer who doesnвЂ™t make it. Continuing on, in the first stage of initiation you are kept separate from the Dauntless born, but you will be evaluated and ranked together. They will be better than you, so you must-- A Mousy haired Erudite girl cuts FOUR off.
Rankings? Why are we ranked?

Your ranking serves two purposes. One, only the top 10 are made members. Two, the rankings will be the order of your job selection. There are very few DESIRABLE positions; rank 5 or below, and you'll end up guarding the fence, with little chance of advancement. There are 11 Dauntless born, and 9 of you. 4 will be cut at the end of the first stage, the rest at the end of the final test. Those who are cut must leave immediately, and be factionless.  16. There is a murmur among the initiates at the word factionless. A broad shouldered Candor girl, Molly, interrupts.
ThatвЂ™s no fair. The Dauntless born have the advantage. If we had known-
(dangerously) If you had known, If you had known what? You wouldnвЂ™t have chosen us? If thatвЂ™s the case, then GET OUT NoW! If you really are us, it doesnвЂ™t matter, youвЂ™re brave.
FOUR turns around wordlessly, and pushes open the dormito doors.
Enjoy. Remember, you chose us, now we have to choose you.

TRIS lies awake staring at the ceiling, the sound of 8 ot breathing in the background. TRIS looks pensive, and her tear up, TRIS quickly dabs the tears out of her eye. Ther a soft strangled sob in the distance, TRIS snaps out of h daze, and turns.
A large, and broad Candor boyвЂ™s, AL, eyes glaze. A sing tear drips down his wet face, slowly, and very slowly fal off his face, and onto the ground.

FOUR stands at the front of the room containing shooting targets, punching bags, sparring areas, and different varieties of fighting instruments and practice areas. Ano DAUNTLESS with long, dark, and greasy hair, cold eyes, an face pierced in too many different places stands beside F the tension between them is very thick, both standing ten The initiates arrive and stand in a very straight line in front of the two, some of them nervous, and others excite  17.
This is Eric, he is a Dauntless leader. FOUR gestures towards ERIC, who just stands there with no reaction.

You will learn how to fight, to prepare yourself to respond to challenges. For Dauntless, it is unthinkable to refuse to meet the challenge. That is life as a Dauntless, meeting the challenges ahead., head on. Technique today, tomorrow youвЂ™1ll fight. Learn fast, and you wonвЂ™t get hurt. The initiates each practice on a black faded punching bag spaced 3 feet apart from each other. TRIS tries out punch
FOUR demonstrates punch #1.
Punch like you mean it, imagine your worst enemy, and punch like you mean it.
TRIS practices punch #2, FOUR watches her from a distance ERIC in the b.g. leaves the training room.
FOUR demonstrates punch #2.

For those who donвЂ™t have much muscle, use your knees and elbows. TRIS practices punch #3, her skin now reddening, and cracking. FOUR demonstrates punch #3, the punching bag thrown aroun like a toy. TRIS practices kick #1, the punching bag barely moves.  18. FOUR demonstrates kick #1 with an explosive kick, sending punching bag up, and hits the roof.
Keep the tension in your abdomen as you kick.

TRIS tries kick #1 again, the punching bag still barely moves. FOUR comes over, and eyes her methodically, and calculatingly. FOUR moves behind TRIS and suddenly puts a hand to her stomach, and pauses. TRIS tenses.
(quietly) Remember, keep the tension here, always. (2 Beats) Never forget that. FOUR retracts his hand, and turns to walk away, TRIS stil stands unmoving, forgetting to breathe.
(beat) Use your elbows, and your knees.
CHRISTINA elbows TRIS gently, TRIS turns her head and loo at CHRISTINA.
That was insane, He scares the hell out of me; that quiet voice he uses.
Yeah, heвЂ™s definitely very... TRIS looks for words.
Intimidating. CHRISTINA accepts that answer, and nods. A very large, an broad boy, AL, approaches them. CHRISTINA spots him, and waves.  19.

Tris, this is my, uh.., friend from my faction.... CHRISTINA notices her mistake, and quickly corrects herse CHRISTINA (CONTвЂ™D) My old faction, Candor, Al. AL reaches them, and offers his had to TRIS.
Nice to meet you Al. IвЂ™m Tris. TRIS takes AlвЂ™s hand.
Nice to meet you as well, Tris. They let go, and AL ponders, and opens his mouth to say something, and closes it again, and opens it once again.
I want to get a tattoo, you guys coming with me? TRIS looks bewildered at this concept.
A tattoo of what?
I donвЂ™t know, I just want to feel like IвЂ™ve actually left my old faction. Stop crying about it. TRIS and CHRISTINA quickly look at the floor at the menti of AL crying.
What? I know you both heard me. TRIS and CHRISTINA smile at ALвЂ™s words, and CHRISTINA p Al playfully in the arm.
Yeah, learn to quiet down, will you? But, you know, you're right if we want to go all the way weвЂ™ve got to really be the part. CHRISTINA specifically looks at TRIS when she says be the part.  20.

(defensively) No, I will not cut my hair, dye my hair, or pierce my face, or do any of that sort of stuff. CHRISTINA drags TRIS by her wrist, and pulls her into the swarming with people. AL follows them. An erudite boy, Wi approaches them, and taps AL on the shoulder.
Mind if I join you guys? AL looks suspicious.
ArenвЂ™t you supposed to be with your Erudite buddies? AL points at EDWARD, and MYRA.
Nah, theyвЂ™re dating. WILL points at EDWARD, and MYRA again, theyвЂ™re kissing
I donвЂ™t want to be the third wheel. CHRISTINA looks at TRIS, and sighs.
(mumbled) Your clothes.....
(curious) WhatвЂ™s wrong with my clothes? TheyвЂ™re not grey anymore....
Come, IвЂ™1l show you. TRIS opens her mouth to protest, but CHRISTINA silences T and drags her in a new direction.
TRISвЂ™ POV TRISвЂ™ eyes are closed, as CHRISTINA is heard moving, mumbling.  21.
Eyeliner, close your eyes tight.
You know, you arenвЂ™t able to make me look pretty.

Watch me! Besides, who cares about pretty, IвЂ™m going to make you noticeable. The sound of eyeliner being applied is heard. CHRISTINA (CONTвЂ™D) Okay, open your eyes now. TRIS opens her eyes, and in the mirror stands TRIS in a f length black dress, shimmering. TRISвЂ™ hair is now loose hanging over her shoulders. Her eyes are now piercing blu not grayish dull blue. Her features now fuller. CHRISTINA looks extremely proud of her work, and gestures to TRIS. CHRISTINA (CONTвЂ™D) (excitedly) See... Striking. You like?
Definitely, I look.... (beat) Different, like a different person. CHRISTINA gives her a funny look.
(hurriedly) ItвЂ™s a good thing. Sorry, itвЂ™s just IвЂ™ve never been allowed to stare at my reflection for this long. CHRISTINA looks shocked.
ThatвЂ™s a real strange faction, come letвЂ™s go watch Al get tattooed. TRIS looks relieved at the change of subject, and follows CHRISTINA out of the shop.  22.
TRIS looks at AlвЂ™s tattoo of a spider with intrigue, TO comes up to her and taps her on the arm. TRIS jumps, and turns.

Nice to see you again, I thought we'd never meet again. TRISвЂ™ expression suddenly changes as if she remembered importance of what TORI said to her testing day, and the that she seemed to be hiding something. TRIS moves very c to TORI, and puts her mouth to TORIвЂ™s ear.
(Whispered) I think we should talk, sometime. TORI tenses, and looks around her seeing no one of intere
(whispered) I donвЂ™t think that would be wise. I canвЂ™t help you anymore. TORIвЂ™s posture changes.
(normal ) Want a tattoo? TRIS looks around, and spots a flying dove design. TRIS points to it.
I want three of those. Tattoos to represent starting a new life, three to represent family I left behind.
ERIC and FOUR stand at the front of the training room, th initiates gather in front of them.

Over the next few days, you will learn to fight each other. ThereвЂ™s an odd number of you, one of you won't fight each day.  23. The initiates all look at the list, TRISвЂ™ name is by it The rest are paired: AL and WILL, MOLLY and CHRISTINA, PE and EDWARD, DREW and MYRA.

Looks like IвЂ™m paired with the tank. CHRISTINA sights, and TRIS looks at the list. TRISвЂ™ eye on the name beside CHRISTINAвЂ™s MOLLY. CHRISTINA (CONTвЂ™D) Yup, Molly, PeterвЂ™s slightly more feminine-looking minion. CHRISTINA and TRIS look to CHRISTINA, CHRISTINA in a grou with PETER, and DREW. They are all tall, broad shouldered bronze skinned, and bulb nosed.

1. AL and WILL Fight, punches exchanged, AL wins 2. PETER and EDWARD fight, evenly matched, EDWARD wins in end. 3. DREW and MYRA Fight, DREW wins easily. 4. MOLLY and CHRISTINA fight, CHRISTINA is easily kicked the side by MOLLY as MOLLY assaults CHRISTINA over, and o again. AL looks nervous as he watches the match, TRIS is intensely focused. CHRISTINA attempts to move out of MOLL way, but MOLLY pins CHRISTINA down, and punches again, an again, CHRISTINAвЂ™s jaw, nose, and mouth. CHRISTINA scre and screams as MOLLY continues to assault her. CHRISTINA (CONTвЂ™D) (wailed)
(beat) Please, IвЂ™m done. ERIC walks over to CHRISTINA furious.
YouвЂ™re done? Done? CHRISTINA weakly nods.
FOUR walks up, and grabвЂ™s ERICвЂ™s shoulder.  24.
According to Dauntless rules, one could also concede, she did concede. ERICвЂ™s eyes narrow, as does FOURвЂ™s.
According to the OLD RULES. In the NEW RULES no one concedes.
A brave man acknowledges the strength of his enemies.
A brave man never surrenders. ERIC and FOUR eye each other for minutes, as a clash of different Dauntless ideals. ERIC wins as heвЂ™s a Dauntle leader. ERIC motions to the entire group.
Follow me.
ERIC shoves CHRISTINA against the railing.
Climb over it. CHRISTINA looks dumbfounded.

(pronouncing deliberately, and slowly) I said, climb over the railing. CHRISTINA hesitantly begins to climb over the narrow, met railing, slippery with the spray of the river. ERIC gives a shove, and CHRISTINA speeds up.
If you hang over the chasm for 5 minutes, your cowardice will be forgiven. If not, well, you better hope the river makes a soft landing. CHRISTINA gets to the top, and slowly moves over, shaking  25.

(softly, shaking) Fine. INSERT - ALвЂ™S WATCH AL sets his watch, and the needle ticks. TRIS, AL, and WI watch, lips pressed together, anticipation showing on the faces. The watch ticks to a minute and a half, CHRISTINAв hands begin slipping just a little due to the water. The watch ticks to three minutes, CHRISTINAвЂ™s slips even mo The watch ticks to four minutes thirty seconds, and the r hits the wall. The white water sprays against CHRISTINAвЂ back, her face strikes the barrier, and she cries out. He hands slip, and sheвЂ™s just holding on by the fingertips her right hand. CHRISTINA tries to get a better grip, but fails. The watch ticks to 4 minutes 55 seconds.
Come on, Christina. Only 5 seconds, 4, 3. CHRISTINA cries out again as her wet hands slip even more
1 second. AL turns to ERIC as the watch ticks to 5 minutes.
TimeвЂ™s up. ERIC takes his time, very slowly checking his watch.
Fine, you can come up. Christina. AL walks towards the railing.
NO. Let her do it.

No she doesnвЂ™t her punishment is up. ERIC doesnвЂ™t respond, and walks away. AL reaches over t railing, and grabs CHRISTINAвЂ™s wrists, and pulls her up CHRISTINA looks traumatized, and her eyes skan our faces.
(quietly) Thanks.  26.

TRIS wakes up, her face, and body is covered in purple-bl bruises. TRIS rolls out of bed, and sees that the word вЂњSTIFFвЂќ has been spray painted in bright red paint on floor in front of her bed. PETER, the burly bulky, transf from Candor walks in, flanked by his two henchmen, Molly, Drew.
Nice decorations. Still a bit stiff from our fight the other day are we? TRIS quickly advances on PETER, but winces because of her injuries.
(dangerously) Did I do something to you, that IвЂ™m unaware of? If you havenвЂ™t noticed yet, (beat) Which I donвЂ™t expect you to, weвЂ™re in the same faction now.

(lightly) I donвЂ™t know what youвЂ™re talking about. (tightly) And you and I will never be in the same faction. I thought youвЂ™d learn that after our fight, I distinctly remember knocking you out. PETER leaves, followed by his henchmen. AL, and CHRISTINA walk in after a few seconds. AL sees the paint, and quick walks to TRIS followed by CHRISTINA.
DonвЂ™t worry about that, weвЂ™ll clean it up. PeterвЂ™s an Idiot, if you donвЂ™t get angry, heвЂ™ll stop eventually. TRIS looks unconvinced.
Yeah...  27.

PeterвЂ™s just evil spirited, donвЂ™t mind him, heвЂ™ll give up if he doesnвЂ™t get his fun. He used to do bad things, and pick fights with the children from school, and when the teachers came heвЂ™d say that they started it. And, everyone believed him because he was in Candor. Despicable really. TRIS looks more convinced.
Yeah.. Al, did you talk to Will? After, well you know...
Yeah, heвЂ™s fine, not angry, we all know that if it wasnвЂ™t him, it was me. (Sighs) Now, IвЂ™ll always be remembered as the first guy who knocked someone out cold. TRIS smiles.
There are worse ways, at least they wonвЂ™t antagonized you.
There are better ways... First jumper. AL nudges TRIS. TRIS, AL, and CHRISTINA notice the time, quickly walks to the training room door. They look at the chalkboard, and beside TRISвЂ™ name is MOLLY.
Oh no.... TheyвЂ™re making you fight her?
Maybe you can just take a few hits, and pretend to go unconscious. No one could blame you.
No, I canвЂ™t, I already lost to Peter, I canвЂ™t loose again. I'll get cut, and be factionless. (MORE)
(determined) I won't be factionless. I canвЂ™t. FOUR moves to the arena.
Up first, Tris, and Molly. MOLLY walks confidently to the arena. TRIS takes a deap breathe, and walks shakily to the area. FOUR grabs her ar
(quietly) Attack first. (beat) You're fast. FOUR lets go of TRISвЂ™ arm, and TRIS continues shakily t arena.
(quietly) You could win, if only you could learn to get them before they get you. MOLLY smirks at TRIS.

Ready to lose, stiff? Is that a birth mark I saw on your ass this morning? TRIS looks murderous, and MOLLY suddenly makes the first move, TRIS ducks, and drives her fist into her stomach. M doesnвЂ™t react to the punch, and attempts to grab TRIS, TRIS ducks, and slips away. TRIS punches MOLLY in the bac MOLLY doesnвЂ™t react to the blow. TRIS sees FOUR standin beside the arena, right elbow bent at a right angle, left hand casually tapping it.

For those who donвЂ™t have much muscle, use your elbows, and knees. MOLLY punches TRIS, TRIS blocks with her forearms. MOLLY groans frustratingly, and sloppily kicks at TRISвЂ™ side. dodges, and MOLLY loses balance. TRIS rushes forward, and drives her elbow into MOLLYвЂ™s face. MOLLY punches TRIS ribs, and TRIS stumbles. MOLLY stands with her hands high stomach, and ribs exposed. TRIS stands with her hands hig stomach, and ribs exposed. TRIS and MOLLY eye each other, TRIS rams her elbow into TRISвЂ™ stomach. MOLLY falls to ground, and TRIS kneads her knee into MOLLYвЂ™s side.  29. TRIS continues to beat MOLLY. MOLLY moves to protect her side, and curls up.
(whispered) Please stop...
(angry) NO, HELL NO, NOT after what you did to me yesterday.

TRIS enters the dormitory wearing only a towel, she freez at the door. PETER, MOLLY, and DREW stand in the back cor laughing, they turn, and look at TRIS. TRIS quickly walks her bed, and fumbles at the drawer. TRIS extracts a dress PETER and MOLLY walk up behind TRIS, and snicker. TRIS tu around, and jumps. TRIS tries to leave, but PETER blocks way.
Didn't realize you were so skinny, Stiff.
GET AWAY from me.
You look like a child, Stiff. No oneвЂ™s following your orders, you aren't with your corrupt, government faction anymore. Look at you, you are a child.

I dunno, maybe she could be hiding something. LetвЂ™s look and see under the towel shall we? TRIS makes a run for it, but PETER grabs on to the back o her towel, and yanks it off revealing TRISвЂ™ naked body. PETER, DREW, an MOLLY laugh, TRIS runs out.
FOUR wraps his arms around TRIS, and TRIS punches MOLLY again. MOLLY gurgles. TRIS struggles against FOURвЂ™s arm
Stop it. YouвЂ™ve won.  30. TRIS relaxes, but glares at FOUR. FOUR looks alarmed.
I think you should leave. Take a walk.
IвЂ™m fine. I really am fine. TRIS walks away.
(to herself) IвЂ™m fine, I donвЂ™t feel guilty, so IвЂ™m fine.
Parents, and Adults mill around, mostly Dauntless a few f other factions. The initiates all walk in, Transfers, and Dauntless-Born. They scatter to look for their parents.

Peter stands with a tall man with busy eyebrows, and a sh meek-looking lady both dressed in black pants, and white shirts. A Dauntless-born initiate with purple hair stands with a woman with a pierced eyebrow, and a tattooed father. Will stands with a woman in a blue dress, very young, sim looking, his sister. Christina hugs a dark-skinned woman in black and white, a younger sister stands beside them. TRISвЂ™ POV As she scans the crowd. She sees initiates standing with parents, and Drew and Molly standing off to the side, wit family beside them. Then, TrisвЂ™ mother appears with gra slacks, and grey jacket buttoned at the throat. Hair ina simple twist, and expression placid. TRISвЂ™ mother turns sees her, and moves towards her. TRIS runs towards her mother, tears jumping out of her ey she hugs her mother, and collapses into her arms.  TRISвЂ™ MOTHER (Whispered, as she runs her had over TRISвЂ™ hair) Beatrice. TRIS blinks, and hugs her mother tighter. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER (CONTвЂ™D) Well, look at you. YouвЂ™ve certainly filled out. Tell me how you are.
You First. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER (laughs ) Today is a special occasion, I came to see you, so letвЂ™s talk mostly about you. It is my gift to you.
One question, whereвЂ™s Dad? Is he visiting Caleb? TRISвЂ™ MOTHER shakes her head. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER Sadly, no. Your father had to be at work.
(Looking Down) You can tell me if he didnвЂ™t want to come. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER Your father has been selfish lately. That doesnвЂ™t mean he doesnвЂ™t love you. I promise. TRIS looks shocked.

What about Caleb? What about visiting him? TRISвЂ™ MOTHER I wish I could, but the Erudite have been prohibiting Abnegation visitors, I would be removed from the premises if I tried. The tension have never been higher. (sigh) (MORE)
TRISвЂ™ MOTHER (CONT'D) I wish it wasnвЂ™t this way, but there isnвЂ™t anything I can do. The lies they spread are greater than ever now.
That's terrible. TRISвЂ™ mother looks around and sees Four. She points at TRISвЂ™ MOTHER Who is that?
Oh, just one of my instructors. Rather intimidating. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER HeвЂ™s HANDSOME.
Yeah......... FOUR moves down, and heads over to TRIS and her Mother. H eyes widen at the sigh of TRISвЂ™ mother, TRISвЂ™ mother recognize him . TRISвЂ™ mother offers her hand.
Hello. My name is Natalie. IвЂ™m BeatriceвЂ™s mother. FOUR accepts the time, and shakes it twice, stiffly. Both stiff.
Four, ItвЂ™s nice to meet you. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER Four, is that a nickname?
Yeas. Your daughter is doing well here. IвЂ™ve been overseeing her. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER ThatвЂ™s good to hear. I know a few things about Dauntless initiation, and I was worried about her.
You shouldnвЂ™t worry.  33. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER ThatвЂ™s excellent, You look familiar for some reason Four.

I canвЂ™t imagine why. (Coldly) I donвЂ™t make a habit of associating with the Abnegation. TRISвЂ™ MOTHER If you say so, but donвЂ™t we all know the truth. (Beat) Few people do associate us these days, I donвЂ™t take it personally.
(Relaxing) Well, IвЂ™1ll leave you to your reunion. FOUR walks off, and WILL arrives. WILLвЂ™s SISTER, CARA, TRIS and her MOTHER a withering look.
I can't believe you associate with THEM, Will. TRISвЂ™ mother, NATALIE, purses her lips.
Cara, no need to be rude.

Oh, certainly not. Do you know what (points at NATALIE) She is? SheвЂ™s a council member's wife is what she is. She runs the volunteer agency (air quotes) That supposedly helps the factionless. You think I donвЂ™t know that youвЂ™re just hoarding goods to distribute to your own faction while WE DONвЂ™T GET FRESH FOOD FOR A MONTH, huh? Food for the factionless, my eye.
IвЂ™m sorry, I believe you are mistaken.  34.
Mistaken. Ha. Hilarious. IвЂ™m sure you're exactly what you seem. A faction of happy-go-lucky do- gooders without a selfish bone in their bodies. Oh definitely. Right.
(Angry) DONвЂ™T YOU DARE SPEAK TO MY MOTHER

head_text.subj: THAT WAY. OR I SWEAR I WILL BREAK

text: Back off Tris. (beat) YouвЂ™re not going to punch my sister.
Try me. (beat) If you expect me to listen to people who spread the lies of the Erudite, and of that hag Jeanine, then you will mistake me.
Now, how are you so sure they are lies? You havenвЂ™t personally gotten involved with this government yet, you know nothing.
I may not know anything, but I HAVE

head_text.subj: MY CERTAINTY. AND WITH THAT I WILL
PROVE YOU WRONG, AND ON WITH THAT I
WILL GO UNTIL I PROVE ALL OF YOU

text: WRONG, ESPECIALLY JEANINE. Now, I suggest you move away and shut your mouth, before I seriously hurt you.

Tris, youвЂ™re not. Come on, Beatrice. We wouldnвЂ™t want to bother your friendвЂ™s sister. NATALIE leads tris through the halls, towards the dining hall, but turns suddenly into a side hall, and rapidly mo She stops, and crouches near tris.
I said no questions about me. I meant it. (MORE)
How are you really doing, Beatrice? How have the fights been? How are you ranked?
Ranked? You know that IвЂ™ve been fighting? You know that IвЂ™m ranked?
ItвЂ™s not top-secret information, how the Dauntless initiation works.
IвЂ™m IвЂ™m close to the bottom, Mom. TRIS looks down in shame.
Good. (nods ) No one looks too closely at the bottom. Now, this is very good news. WhatвЂ™s more important was, whatвЂ™s your aptitude results? TRIS looks conflicted, and opens and closes her mouth.
DonвЂ™t tell anyone..... TRIS opens and closes her mouth again.
(hesitantly, and softly) They were, inconclusive.

(sighs) I thought as much. Many children who are raised Abnegation receive that result. No reason, they just do. You must be very careful during the next stage of initiation, Beatrice. Stay in the middle, no matter what you do, no attention to yourself. Understand?
(surprised) WhatвЂ™s going on?
I donвЂ™t have much time, but remember I donвЂ™t care what faction you chose, I am you mother, and I want to keep you safe.
Is this because IвЂ™m D- NATALIE cuts TRIS off immediately.
DonвЂ™t ever say that word, ever.
Why?
I canвЂ™t say. Footsteps shuffle in the distance.
I don't have time now, Visitng day is over, but thereвЂ™s something you should do. If you see your brother, go find him, and tell him to research the simulation serum. Okay? Can you do that?
Not unless you EXPLAIN some of this to me, Mom. You want me to go to the Erudites, at least give me a reason.
IвЂ™m sorry, I canвЂ™t. I have to leave, but tell your brother, and donвЂ™t seem attached to me, or your brother.
I donвЂ™t care what I look to them.

But you have to. YOU MUST. I suspect they are already monitoring you. Have a piece of cake for me, all right? The chocolate. ItвЂ™s delicious, baked by Tori, we had a good long history.  37. NATALIE runs off into the distance, and TRIS follows. NAT climbs up the wall with ease, and on the ankle of foot, a tattoo. TRIS sees, and her eyes widen, and she runs after NATALIE.
Mom? Were you Dauntless? NATALIE is no where to be seen.
ERIC stands holding the list of rankings for stage one of initiation, in the shadows invisible to eyes stands Jeani
Eric. I trust you know what to do with the next section of the initiation. Watch for the signs.
And, if I find them?
Contact me, and we will figure out a PERMANENT solution to the problems. Especially her, her result was manually logged, and Abnegation.

But, she displays perfect Dauntless principles, I expected much less than what I have seen from her. I donвЂ™t think she will be a problem, she is not a problem to us, I donвЂ™t think she displays the attributes. Her slugging of Molly was particularly brutal, and Dauntless.

Trust me, remember my IQ is so much higher than yours. I got you this job, you know why we selected you to carry out the Erudite collaboration with the Dauntless. I trust I know where your loyalties lie.
Yes, maвЂ™am.  38.

(tightly) Good. JEANINE leaves, heels clicking. ERIC goes in the opposite direction, and takes a left going up to the wall outside dormitories. He posts the list up on the board, and the transfer initiates all crowd around it. TRIS, AL, WILL, a CHRISTINA stand near the back. ERIC leaves as FOUR enters room and takes ERICвЂ™s place in front of the list.

The ranks are here, before you see them, there are some things that need to be explained. After the first round of fights, we ranked you according to your skill level. The points you got are determined by how you did relative to your opponent. You got more points for improving, and for beating someone stronger. If you have a high rank you lose points for losing to a lower ranked opponent. MOLLY coughs in the background.
Those who prey on the weak are not rewarded. THAT IS COWARDICE. FOUR glances at Peter.

Your rankings are separated by Dauntless-born and Tranfers, cuts are announced tomorrow. TRIS, AL, CHRISTINA, and WILL rush up to see the rankings THey read: 1. Edward 2. Peter 3. Will 4. Christina 5. Mol 6. Tris 7. Drew 8. Al 9. Myra. The entire group looks confused.
(outraged) How am I ranked lower than her? (gestures to Christina) I beat her in minutes.
(smug) Yeah? And? Your point being?  39.
I should be ranked above her!

If you intend on a high rank you shouldnвЂ™t make it a habit to lose to lower ranked opponents. MOLLY glares at TRIS, and then turns on her heel and ente the dormitories, PETER and DREW follow. WILL and CHRISTIN slap hands, and WILL hugs TRIS.
Look at you. Number six. WILL grins at TRIS.
(anxious) Still might not have been good enough...
DonвЂ™t worry, it will be. We should celebrate. CHRISTINA grabs CHRISTINA, and ALвЂ™s arm.
Come on, Al. You donвЂ™t know now the Dauntless-borns did. You donвЂ™t know anything for sure, we should still celebrate while we still can. AL looks at his feet.
(mumbled) IвЂ™m just going to go to bed. AL pulls his arm free, and slouches into the dormitory.

PETER stands in the darkness, barely visible. He stands o a bed, raises his arms, he holds a knife in his hands. ANGLE ON - KNIFE IN PETERвЂ™S HAND The knife is slowly raised, and shakes. Then, the knife suddnely plunges.  40. A scream rings out, EDWARD'S scream. The entire dormitory springs into action.

Someone turn on the lights! The lights flicker on, and EDWARD lies on the floor next his bed, clutching at his face. A halo of blood surrounds head, and a knife juts out of his face. CHRISTINA (CONTвЂ™D) IsnвЂ™t that the butter knife from the dining hall? MYRA walks up to EDWARD, and screams. Someone else scream and in the distance someone yells for help. The sound of vomit rings.
Take it out! It hurts! Take it out! TRIS kneels next to him.
No. You have to let the doctor take it out. Hear me? Let the doctor take it out. Now breathe. It will be all right.
It hurts!
It will be all right, now breathe. The DAUNTLESS nurses arrive, and carry EDWARD out of the room. TRISвЂ™ hands, and knees are now soaked in blood. P enters the room.
TRIS sits at the table with CHRISTINA, AL, and WILL, eati steak.
Did you hear? Edward, and Myra quit.
Really? Myra?
Yeah, she was going to get cut anyways, and she said that she didnвЂ™t want to be here without him anyways.
Anyone find out who the two Dauntless-born that got cut were?
Nope, but at least I didnвЂ™t get cut. TRIS, and WILL all stare at AL.
What? I was going to get cut if Edward didnвЂ™t quite. You know itвЂ™s true.
